conbody.p: Install Xcode version 10.2 or newer. You can download Xcode from the App Store or the Apple Developer website: Xcode 13.

ul.li: Xcode must support the current version of your iOS device.
Katalon Studio can only support iOS version 9.0 or above. To learn more about the supported environment in Katalon Studio, you can refer to this document: Supported environment.
